channel.title: Use Cases on
channel.description: Recent content in Use Cases on

item.title: For Designers
item.description: To increase the durability of the USB Nugget, we continue to develop a series of 3D printed cases to protect Nuggets from accidental damage. You can find the files to print, modify, or remix our case designs in the case section of our GitHub repository.

item.title: For Developers
item.description: We welcome contributions from our community! You can find the code for the USB Nugget at our GitHub repository. We welcome pull requests! Thank you for helping us make the Nugget even more powerful.

item.title: For Support
item.description: If you’re having software or hardware problems with the USB Nugget, please open an issue on our GitHub repository. Make sure to include the following information: Is this a bug, feature request, or feedback? What steps are needed to reproduce the issue? What is the expected result? What is supposed to happen? What is the actual result? What does the bug look like?
